title: Floral - Watch Face
summary: ~ A new Cute Watchface to face every moment of your day :) ~
description: Floreal is a simple and beautiful WatchFace for your Smartwatch.Floral has a digital interface plus a smooth second hand, you can choose between five beautiful floral backgrounds to face every moment of your day.This Watchface is compatible with all Android Wear Smartwatches (Moto 360, G Watch R, Asus Zenwatch, etc.)Features:✔ Support both round and square displays✔ Different background that can be changed every time you want✔ Displayed additional information like numeric date and analog second✔ Customizable date and theme✔ Intregrated configurations options (Both Watch and Phone)How to use:● Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. (may take a few minutes)● Select the watchface by long press your current watchface and select the one that you have installed.● The customization options are accessible by long pressing the watch face, or directly from the Android Wear app.● Enjoy your new beautiful Watchface!Note:● If you’re not satisfied, you can get a refund within 15 minutes from the purchase.● If you have a problem, before express a bad rating, please give us a chance to help you, Send a feedback to  quantumdust.mobile@gmail.com● Like this watchface? Check out our other cool watchfaces! http://goo.gl/3onPw7Follow MhzDev on Google+: http://goo.gl/Uo9KEE
descriptionHTML:
Floreal is a simple and beautiful WatchFace for your Smartwatch.
Floral has a digital interface plus a smooth second hand, you can choose between five beautiful floral backgrounds to face every moment of your day.

This Watchface is compatible with all Android Wear Smartwatches (Moto 360, G Watch R, Asus Zenwatch, etc.)

Features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Different background that can be changed every time you want
✔ Displayed additional information like numeric date and analog second
✔ Customizable date and theme
✔ Intregrated configurations options (Both Watch and Phone)

How to use:
● Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. (may take a few minutes)
● Select the watchface by long press your current watchface and select the one that you have installed.
● The customization options are accessible by long pressing the watch face, or directly from the Android Wear app.
● Enjoy your new beautiful Watchface!

Note:
● If you’re not satisfied, you can get a refund within 15 minutes from the purchase.
● If you have a problem, before express a bad rating, please give us a chance to help you, Send a feedback to quantumdust.mobile@gmail.com
● Like this watchface? Check out our other cool watchfaces! http://goo.gl/3onPw7

Follow MhzDev on Google+: http://goo.gl/Uo9KEE
comments: Only 24 hr? I think I had it on 12 hr at one point but now it's definitely on 24hr again. So am I crazy or is there a way to switch it that I unconsciously discovered? Anyway, I can't do it again if there is. I have emailed about this and gotten no response. Ugh.
12 hour needed! Would like better if 12 hour was selectable
